Package: com.jcatalog.grailsflow.process

[Groovy] Class ProcessProvider

    • com.jcatalog.grailsflow.process.ProcessProvider

    • ProcessProvider class is used for getting processes by conditions and variablesFilter

      Authors:
      Stephan Albers
      July Karpey
      Maria Voitovich

        • java.util.List getProcessList(ProcessSearchParameters searchParameters)

          Finds processes and theirs nodes according to authorities, statuses and variable filter.

          Parameters:
          type
          status
          username
          startedFrom
          startedTo
          finishedFrom
          finishedTo
          variablesFilter - (varName : set of varValues)
          sortBy - - process field or process variable value if sortBy="var."
          ascending
          maxResult - - to restrict the maximum size of the list
          offset - - for paging
          Returns:
          list of processes according to filters

        • java.lang.Integer getProcessListSize(ProcessSearchParameters searchParameters)
